content:
Sure, here are some additional possible ways to address the challenge of confusion with the Artifact CI or CI integration page name:

1. Rename the page: One straightforward approach is to rename the page to more accurately reflect its purpose. For example, the page could be renamed to "CI Integration Workflows" or "Artifact Promotion Workflows" to more clearly indicate its function. This can help users better understand the page's purpose and reduce confusion.
